name: Layer Identity Provider
description: Basic identity provider to handle authentication with Layer

LAYER_KEY_ID.description: Your Layer key ID, which can be found in the 'Authentication Keys' section on the Keys page of the Layer Developer Dashboard

LAYER_PROVIDER_ID.description: Your Layer Provider ID, which can be found in the 'Provider ID' section of the Keys page of the Layer Developer Dashboard

LAYER_PRIVATE_KEY.description: Contents of your RSA private key, generated on the Instastart page or from the Keys page of the Layer Developer Dashboard

LAYER_APP_ID.description: Your Layer app ID, which can be found in the 'Keys' section of the Layer Developer Dashboard

LAYER_SERVER_API_TOKEN.description: Your Layer Server API Bearer token, which can be found in the 'Server API' section of the Layer Developer Dashboard
